text: Julie Kumari Mahato (also Juli Kumari Mahato) is a Nepali communist politician and a member of the House of Representatives of the federal parliament of Nepal. She was elected from CPN UML under the proportional representation system. In the 2013 elections for the second constituent assembly, she was a candidate for CPN UML from Dhanusa-3 constituency. A long time member of CPN UML, she was appointed a "Co-Incharge" of Dhanusa district for Nepal Communist Party (NCP), the new party formed by the merger of CPN UML and CPN (Maoist Centre), in 2019. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Members of the House of Representatives (Nepal) Category:Nepalese communists Category:Nepalese women in politics Category:Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxist–Leninist) politicians Category:21st-century women politicians Category:Nepalese politicians by party
title: Julie Kumari Mahato
